TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23OFPI-P2-LDAPselect to_char(begin_interval_time,'yy/mm/dd hh24:mm') c1, object_name c2, space_used_total c3 from dba_hist_seg_stat s, dba_hist_seg_stat_obj o, dba_hist_snapshot sn where o.owner = 'APPLSYS' and s.obj# = o.obj# and sn.snap_id = s.snap_id and object_name like 'FND_LOG_MESSAGES' order by begin_interval_time
